title: Help me figure out these fonts please
author: Munkie

comments.content:
Bon Vivant could be one of two similar typefaces (though I'm pretty sure there is a more common one out there, I just can't remember its name):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/salzburg-rr/medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/salzburg-rr/medium/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/salzburg-rr/medium/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/castle/demi-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/castle/demi-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/castle/demi-bold/")

Personal Chef Service may be:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-solitaire-pro/book/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-solitaire-pro/book/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/mvb-solitaire-pro/book/")

Devin Tabor Chef:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/roundhand/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/roundhand/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/roundhand/")

Bon vivant: confirming Castle  
Personal Chef Service: [Tahoma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Tahoma)  
Devin Tabor Chef: complete name is [Snell Roundhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171524/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Snell+roundhand)
